TopicTitle: [1.0.5] RSS Planets & Moons expanded v0.12.0 Sedna is finally here!

Articles.Content:
WOW, this is a really great mod. Keep it up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

PS: love the new Pluto textures ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> WOW, this is a really great mod. Keep it up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> PS: love the new Pluto textures ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks a lot!
I will add rings to Neptune also. They will be very faint,because they probably are IRL. Since we can't know for sure how they look, I'll try to make them look right

That's a little too faint maybe..

![bFbKltI.png](http://i.imgur.com/bFbKltI.png)

> 
> That's a little too faint maybe..
> [http://i.imgur.com/bFbKltI.png](http://i.imgur.com/bFbKltI.png)

 But realistic! Keep it like that.
Your work is awesome pozine, keep it up!

I made a first attempt at making Miranda. This moon of Uranus has the tallest recorded cliff in the solar system at 10km high

I hope to get the heightmap a little better. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) So, expect awesomeness in next version

Verona Rupes

![WshcgUg.png](http://i.imgur.com/WshcgUg.png)

> 
> ![nACUjkG.png](http://i.imgur.com/nACUjkG.png)
> 
> ![QPg5QIX.png](http://i.imgur.com/QPg5QIX.png)
> 
>
I wish I could get this, but I have Active Texture Management with Realism Overhaul. Even with the aggressive one I don't think my memory can handle another big mod. GG Windows GG

> 
> I wish I could get this, but I have Active Texture Management with Realism Overhaul. Even with the aggressive one I don't think my memory can handle another big mod. GG Windows GG

A lite version would be a good idea then... I'll think about it.

> 
> A lite version would be a good idea then... I'll think about it.

You'll get all the rep then.

Only half of the surface of Uranus moons were mapped by Voyager. I will add them anyway in next version, feel free to delete the bodies if you don't like it. (Ariel, Oberon and Umbriel)

This is what i mean : [http://i.imgur.com/pSe9vl4.png](http://i.imgur.com/pSe9vl4.png)

> 
> ![OX2VnBW.png](http://i.imgur.com/OX2VnBW.png)
> 
>

> 
> Only half of the surface of Uranus moons were mapped by Voyager. I will add them anyway in next version, feel free to delete the bodies if you don't like it. (Ariel, Oberon and Umbriel)
> This is what i mean : [http://i.imgur.com/pSe9vl4.png](http://i.imgur.com/pSe9vl4.png)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > 
> > [http://i.imgur.com/OX2VnBW.png](http://i.imgur.com/OX2VnBW.png)
> > 
> >

You could just mirror the textures and heightmap and shop out any notable features from the other side

It's a hack but it's better than a blank half IMO

> 
> You could just mirror the textures and heightmap and shop out any notable features from the other side
> It's a hack but it's better than a blank half IMO

I just found that SpaceEngine already has created textures for these moons and generated false textures for the missing areas. I'm going to use that. The resolution is low, but better than nothing!

**UPDATE 0.7.0 2015/08/09**

**-** Added Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel and Oberon

- Changed Uranus texture to make it look more like this : [True color Uranus](http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/voyager/pia00032.html)

- Added faint rings to Neptune
